Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the Azure Digital Twins implementation, including the scope, expected data sources, and integration needs with IoT devices.
Create a detailed architecture plan for the Azure Digital Twins solution, including the twin graph, relationships, and integration points with IoT devices and other Azure services.

Tasks.Task: Set Up Azure Digital Twins Instance
Tasks.Task Description: Provision an Azure Digital Twins instance in the Azure portal, ensuring proper configuration of the resource group, region, and naming conventions.
Create and upload Digital Twin Definition Language (DTDL) models to define the structure and relationships of the digital twins.
Connect Azure IoT Hub to Azure Digital Twins to enable data ingestion from IoT devices. Configure routing and endpoints for seamless integration.
Configure role-based access control (RBAC), Azure Active Directory (AAD) integration, and encryption for data at rest and in transit to secure the Azure Digital Twins environment.
Create custom logic for processing incoming data from IoT devices, including event routing, data transformation, and storage in Azure services like Blob Storage or Cosmos DB.
Perform end-to-end testing of the Azure Digital Twins setup, including data ingestion, twin updates, and integration with IoT devices.
Set up monitoring and alerting for the Azure Digital Twins instance using Azure Monitor and Log Analytics to track performance and detect anomalies.
Create detailed documentation for the Azure Digital Twins architecture, configurations, and operational procedures. Share with relevant stakeholders.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the Azure Digital Twins setup.
Implement regular audits to ensure compliance with security and operational standards for the Azure Digital Twins environment.
